text: Gentiana parryi, or Parry's gentian, is a species of the genus Gentiana. It is a perennial forb/herb native to Wyoming, Utah, Colorado and New Mexico. ==References== parryi Category:Flora of the Rocky Mountains Category:Flora of Colorado Category:Flora of New Mexico Category:Flora of Wyoming Category:Flora of Utah Category:Taxa named by Carl Linnaeus
title: Gentiana parryi
